code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import firebase,{storage}from'firebase';import{getFirebase}from'react-redux-firebase';import{reduxFirestore,getFirestore,createFirestoreInstance}from'redux-firestore';import rootReducer from'./rootReducers';import fbConfig from'../config/database/firebase';var store=createStore(rootReducer,compose(applyMiddleware(thunk.withExtraArgument({getFirebase:getFirebase,getFirestore:getFirestore,storage:storage})),reduxFirestore(fbConfig)));export var rrfProps={firebase:firebase,config:(fbConfig,{useFirestoreForProfile:true,userProfile:'users',attachAuthIsReady:true}),dispatch:store.dispatch,createFirestoreInstance:createFirestoreInstance};export default store;
